Headline: #N5 South Shore Night Bus, #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: N5 South Shore Night Bus, 9 Ashland buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th; Wb: 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#N5 South Shore Night Bus, #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
